channel.title: Home on The International Obfuscated JavaScript Code Contest
channel.description: Recent content in Home on The International Obfuscated JavaScript Code Contest

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Q: Is this related to the IOCCC? A: It’s been inspired by it, but it’s completely unrelated. Q: Who are the judges? A: Judges are yet to be announced. Q: How do I enter? A: See section How To Enter. Q: How often will the contest run? A: The contest will open roughly once per year. Watch this space for the announcement. Q: How can I contact the people behind this?

item.title: Partner
item.description: The International Obfuscated JavaScript Contest is proudly partnering with: Jscrambler - From code to webpage, Jscrambler is the #1 security solution to tamper proof your web application arvid.io - Thoughts on programming and more Want to become a partner? Contact us at judges [at] iojscc [dot] org.

item.title: Rules
item.description: To make sure your submission will be considered, we ask you to follow these rules. Please read them carefully before submission. ยง 1 Submissions must be complete programs ยง 2 Submissions must satisfy the size requirements 1. The size of your submission must not exceed 4096 bytes 2. The number of bytes, excluding whitespace (space, tab, newline, return, formfeed) and certain control characters (;, {, }) followed by whitespace, while counting the JavaScript keywords as 1 byte, must not exceed 2048.

item.title: Size Tool
item.description: Copy your code below, and click submit. var keywords = [ 'break', 'case', 'catch', 'class', 'const', 'continue', 'debugger', 'default', 'delete', 'do', 'else', 'export', 'extends', 'finally', 'for', 'function', 'if', 'import', 'in', 'instanceof', 'new', 'return', 'super', 'switch', 'this', 'throw', 'try', 'typeof', 'var', 'void', 'while', 'with', 'yield', 'await', 'null', 'true', 'false', ]; /* * Taken from: * https://stackoverflow.com/a/18729931/1070117 */ function toUTF8Array(str) { var utf8 = []; for (var i=0; i 6), 0x80 | (charcode & 0x3f)); } else if (charcode = 0xe000) { utf8.

item.title: Winner
item.description: Contest currently ongoing. Winners will be announced after closing.
